name: sussexfunerals
short_description:
Personal Funeral Services in Brighton and Hove

Sussex Funeral Services, situated in Hove along Portland Road, offers one of Brighton and Hove's leading funerary services. We understand that arranging a funeral for a loved one will be one of the hardest things you have ever needed to do. From the moment that you contact Sussex Funeral Services we help you through your grief by handling all of the arrangements. There are many options available to you to personalize the service to your loved one, as there are no true rules for funerary services. Beginning to end, our services are unique to you and your loved ones..


For Caring, Compassion, and Choice: Sussex Funeral Services

If you're seeking conventional services or something alternative, burial or cremation, Sussex Funeral Services can help you arrange everything within budget. 

Sussex Funerals
185 Portland Road, Hove, Sussex, BN3 5QJ
Phone: 01273 736469
